languages.text: Every time Nazrakhei suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from weapon attacks, he instantly grants an ally (allies with obey my authority have highest priority) an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. The creature which gained that extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} tries to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the enemy who damaged Nazrakhei.
languages.original_text: При каждом получении {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от оружия Назракей немедленно дает союзнику {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} (в приоритете союзники, на которых действует "Немедленно подчиниться!") Существо, получившее дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, пытается атаковать противника, который нанес урон Назракею.

traits.locale_text: Every time Nazrakhei suffers damage from weapon attacks, he instantly grants an ally (allies with obey my authority have highest priority) an extra turn. The creature which gained that extra turn tries to hit the enemy who damaged Nazrakhei.

Every time Nazrakhei suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from weapon attacks, he instantly grants an ally (allies with obey my authority have highest priority) an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. The creature which gained that extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} tries to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the enemy who damaged Nazrakhei.

Every time Nazrakhei suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from weapon attacks, he instantly grants an ally (allies with obey my authority have highest priority) an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. The creature which gained that extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} tries to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the enemy who damaged Nazrakhei.

languages.text: Cada vez que Nazrakhei sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de ataques de armas, concede a un aliado (tienen preferencia los aliados afectados por ¡Acatad mi autoridad!) un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g}. La criatura que recibe el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} extra intentará {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} al enemigo que ha herido a Nazrakhei.
languages.original_text: Every time Nazrakhei suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from weapon attacks, he instantly grants an ally (allies with obey my authority have highest priority) an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. The creature which gained that extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} tries to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the enemy who damaged Nazrakhei.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que Nazrakhei sufre daño de ataques de armas, concede a un aliado (tienen preferencia los aliados afectados por ¡Acatad mi autoridad!) un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g}. La criatura que recibe el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} extra intentará atacar al enemigo que ha herido a Nazrakhei.{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}

languages.text: 每当纳札骸受到武器攻击{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，他会立刻赐予其中一位盟友一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，受到“服从于我”影响的盟友会被优先选择。获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}的生物会试图攻击伤害纳札骸的敌人。
languages.original_text: Every time Nazrakhei suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from weapon attacks, he instantly grants an ally (allies with obey my authority have highest priority) an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. The creature which gained that extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} tries to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the enemy who damaged Nazrakhei.

traits.locale_text: 每当纳札骸受到武器攻击伤害时，他会立刻赐予其中一位盟友一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，受到“服从于我”影响的盟友会被优先选择。获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}的生物会试图攻击伤害纳札骸的敌人。{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}
每当纳札骸受到武器攻击{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，他会立刻赐予其中一位盟友一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，受到“服从于我”影响的盟友会被优先选择。获得额外回合{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}的生物会试图攻击伤害纳札骸的敌人。

languages.text: Chaque fois que Nazrakhei subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} provoqués par une arme, il confère instantanément un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} à un allié (les alliés sous l'effet d'Obéissez-moi ! sont prioritaires). La créature ayant bénéficié de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire essaie de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}toucher{/g} l'ennemi qui a infligé des dégâts à Nazrakhei.
languages.original_text: Every time Nazrakhei suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from weapon attacks, he instantly grants an ally (allies with obey my authority have highest priority) an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. The creature which gained that extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} tries to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the enemy who damaged Nazrakhei.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que Nazrakhei subit des dégâts provoqués par une arme, il confère instantanément un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} à un allié (les alliés sous l'effet d'Obéissez-Moi ! sont prioritaires). La créature ayant bénéficié de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire essaie de {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}toucher{/g} l'ennemi qui a infligé des dégâts à Nazrakhei.

languages.text: Wenn Nazrakhei durch Waffen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleidet, gewährt er einem Verbündeten augenblicklich einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} (mit "Gehorche meinem Befehl!" belegte Verbündete haben die höchste Priorität). Die Kreatur, die diesen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zusatzzug{/g} erhalten hat, versucht den Feind zu {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g}, der Nazrakhei Schaden zugefügt hat.
languages.original_text: Every time Nazrakhei suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from weapon attacks, he instantly grants an ally (allies with obey my authority have highest priority) an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. The creature which gained that extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} tries to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the enemy who damaged Nazrakhei.

traits.locale_text: Jedes Mal, wenn Nazrakhei durch Waffen Schaden nimmt, gewährt er einem Verbündeten augenblicklich einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatz-Zug{/g} (Verbündete mit Gehorche meinem Befehl! haben die höchste Priorität). Die Kreatur, die diesen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zusatz-Zug{/g} erhalten hat, versucht den Feind zu {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}treffen{/g}, der Nazrakhei Schaden zugefügt hat.

languages.text: ナズラクヘイが武器による{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるたびに、味方の1人(私の権威に従えで味方になった者は優先順位が高い）に直ちに{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を付与する。追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を獲得した生物は、ナズラクヘイにダメージを与えた敵への攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}試みる{/g}。
languages.original_text: Every time Nazrakhei suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from weapon attacks, he instantly grants an ally (allies with obey my authority have highest priority) an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. The creature which gained that extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} tries to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the enemy who damaged Nazrakhei.

traits.locale_text: ナズラクヘイが武器によるダメージを受けるたびに、味方の1人(私の権威に従えで味方になった者は優先順位が高い）に直ちに{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を付与する。追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を獲得した生物は、ナズラクヘイにダメージを与えた敵への{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}攻撃{/g}を試みる。

ナズラクヘイが武器による{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるたびに、味方の1人(私の権威に従えで味方になった者は優先順位が高い）に直ちに{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を付与する。追加ターンを獲得した生物は、ナズラクヘイにダメージを与えた敵への攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}試みる{/g}。

languages.text: Nazrakhei, silah saldırılarından her {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} aldığında bir dost birimine (otoriteme itaat et kabiliyetinin etkisi altındaki dost birimler yüksek önceliklidir) anında bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandırır. Ek {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} kazanan yaratık, Nazrakhei'e hasar veren düşmana {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurur{/g}.

The creature which gained that extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} tries to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the enemy who damaged Nazrakhei.
